- [x] hamburger menu

Overall design

- [x] Dark mode

title: Display email verification message in response to forbidden errors coming from the backend (mobile)
description:
When new users without a verified email address take a write action on the back end, it will respond with a 403. The apps need to catch the error and display the email verification banner

Estimating with a large budget for potential corner cases

title: Explicit tag not working on comments
description:
Copying this over from front to make sure it's gets addressed in mobile
### Summary

If you tag a comment as explicit, the mask does not appear.

### Steps to reproduce

Write a comment, set it to E, then submit comment. No mask appears.

### Platform information

macbook, ios, chrome

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

see summary

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

explicit comments should be displayed behind a mask

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

(Paste any relevant logs - please use code blocks (\`\`\`) to format console output, logs, and code as it's very hard to read otherwise.)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Search alternatives to implement a parallelogram with shadows in RN
Implement video autoplay for Plus with option to disable
description:
For Pro and plus customers:

- [x] the top video should begin playing when it's in the view port.
- [x] Only one video should be playing at a time (this should be handled by the plyr instances)
- [x] The video should be playing muted (@markeharding 's request)
- [x] The video should unmute when clicked
- [x] Scrolling out of the view port should stop the video
- [ ] The video should resume playpack with audio in the modal pager / media modal when viewing the video in a single entity view

title: Build 3.14 rc2 and release
Wireup mobile video player to the new api url
description:
Rather than our browser redirect, use the new urls for the video transcodes on

https://www.minds.com/api/v2/media/video/1046209597367287808?

Note the direct sources in the responses of these new api calls.

Point the existing player to the new sources.

Make it play the lowest/fastest resolution possible without doing too much overhaul. We want it to work, but fast is good too.

title: Upload apks to browserstack
Build 3.14.0 rc1
Version bump and language update
Improve mobile error message and add retry logic
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

The error message shown on a failed request (as below on failed upvote) is not helpful to the user or developer.


### Steps to reproduce

1. Lose connectivity.
2. Try upvote something.

### Platform information

Cross-platform mobile.

### App version

v3.12.0

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Generic error is shown to user.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

should show an alert / modal to the user informing them of the error (voting could not be done). Also a retry button would be ideal.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![Screenshot_20191214-132038_Minds](/uploads/9a1caae9152f48fb9e3e043fc309c1f0/Screenshot_20191214-132038_Minds.jpg)

### Possible fixes

- [ ] Add specific error messages to retry failures
- [ ] Add a retry button for failed network requests (if possible without significant re-architecture)

/label ~"T \- Bug" ~"S \- Triage:new"

No comment deletion option
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

There is no option to delete comments iOS and Android.

![image](/uploads/9f1f06f8d3fb68a0fa1063c44fbbcbdb/image.png)

### Steps to reproduce

1. Go to comment
2. Press comment
3. No deletion option appears

### Platform information

Latest version of Android / iOS

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

* https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1050208282378067968
* https://www.minds.com/newsfeed/1050220624535281664

title: Implement automatic cleanup and upload of translation files
description:
- [ ] Implement fastlane that downloads, updates and sanitizes translation files
- [ ] Use the githook https://www.git-scm.com/docs/githooks#_post_checkout to call a script that will download the translation files if the branch starts with `release`
- [ ] Implement a build step that uploads the changes translation files for branches marked `release`

title: Scheduled Post counter is not updating when scheduling a post
description:
v3.12.0 RC5, IOS 13, ipad

Schedule a post from your channel
Notice the counter does not increment.
Navigated to the discovery screen and back.
The counter will be incremented

title: Animated gifs are no longer animated when uploading from IOS cameraroll
description:
v3.12.0 RC5, IOS 13, IPAD

Download an animated gif to your device
Open Minds and post the gif.
Notice how it is animated in the camera roll during selection
Upload it
It will no longer be animated
Viewing it on the site will not be animated

Probably just the mime type
